resources.string: Poor Condition - Includes cars that have heavy body damage or functional issues but the car generally still works as intended.
Good Condition - Includes cars that have minor body damage but are generally in good condition and have no functional issues.
Spares or Repairs - Includes cars that are non-functional or have major faults that prevent the car from working as intended.
Perfect Condition - Includes cars that have no cosmetic or functional issues.
